attributes.action: Provide reusable and washable cloth bags to all households and then ban shops from providing any free plastic bags.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Free plastic bags are a waste of resources, difficult to dispose of and make a mess of our environment. However some people find it difficult to afford all the bags they need and others are worried about products contaminating one another therefore the government should provide a set amount of reusable and machine washable cloth bags to every household in the UK and then completely ban the free plastic bag.
